author: Tabitha Baker
title: How to get a Tesco home delivery or click & collect slot today
description: We're running through everything you need to know from booking a Tesco home delivery slot to how Click & Collect works.
content:
If you've been trying to book a Tesco home delivery slot for a while now, you're not alone. Tesco has been inundated with demand for its food delivery service over the past few weeks as more shoppers stay home. 
With such a high volume of orders, Tesco is ur… [+2706 chars]
